hero.heading: Hi ‚Äî I'm Adarsh
hero.sub: Focused on Data Analytics, Machine Learning & real-world data applications ‚Äî learning, building, and innovating every day.

about.title: About Me
about.desc: I'm a passionate Data Analytics student at IIT Patna, specializing in Python, SQL, and business intelligence tools like Power BI and Tableau. I enjoy transforming raw data into meaningful insights, building dashboards, and solving analytical problems. I believe in learning by doing and constantly improving through real-world projects.
highlights: BS (Hons.) in Computer Science & Data Analytics ‚Äî IIT Patna
Hands-on experience in Python, SQL & Power BI
Good understanding of dashboard design & data visualization

projects.title: AI Chatbot ‚Äî GPT Based
projects.desc: Flask backend + Gemini API chatbot with caching & rate-limiting.
projects.details: This project is an AI-powered chatbot created using Flask as the backend and Google Gemini API for responses. Includes caching, rate limiting, and deployment-ready scripts.

projects.title: My Personal Protfolio
projects.desc: A collection of real-world projects demonstrating my skills and problem-solving.
projects.details: This portfolio is built using a modern and scalable tech stack, integrating the latest tools and frameworks to deliver high performance, smooth UI, and responsive user experience. It demonstrates my adaptability to new technologies and my ability to design, develop, and deploy end-to-end applications.

projects.title: Capstone ‚Äî Chat Generation Bot
projects.desc: Realtime chat system with WebSocket communication.
projects.details: A collaborative realtime communication platform featuring WebSockets, message persistence and user presence.

experience.desc: Completed a real-world data analytics simulation powered by Generative AI workflows.
